script.name: Cmd.ScanAsteroids
script.description: Cmd: Scans asteroids in all sectors

line.comment: * $IsKnownSector = $SectorCurrent-> is sector known by the player
* do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsHostileTo' : raceOrObject1=$Owner raceOrObject2=[OWNER]
* do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsBlacklisted' : race=[OWNER] item=$SectorCurrent
* $Msg = sprintf: fmt='%s has scanned all asteroids in %s.', [THIS], [SECTOR], null, null, null

sval.val: Cmd: Scans asteroids in all sectors
$IsKnownSector = $SectorCurrent-> is sector known by the player
do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsHostileTo' : raceOrObject1=$Owner raceOrObject2=[OWNER]
do if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsBlacklisted' : race=[OWNER] item=$SectorCurrent
$Msg = sprintf: fmt='%s has scanned all asteroids in %s.', [THIS], [SECTOR], null, null, null
